description: Numbers n such that the set of base 9 digits of n equals the set of base 10 digits of n.
example: 1380 is in the sequence because 1380 in base 9 is 1803.
maple: a:=proc(n) if convert(convert(n,base,9),set)=convert(convert(n,base,10),set) then n else fi end: seq(a(n),n=1..12000); - _Emeric Deutsch_, Apr 30 2006
author: _Clark Kimberling_
extensions: More terms from Don Reble (djr(AT)nk.ca), Apr 28 2006
